attributes.action: Completely ban all hydrogenated oils from our foods
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Hydrogenated oils that are in many foods have been shown to cause coronary heart disease, high cholesterol and strokes, diabetes type II, cancer, impaired immune system, auto-immune problems and other health problems. It is only in your food to increase the shelf life of the product - ie, to make more money for the manufacturer. I request that it be removed completely.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
